dtaf2025.name: Space Update
gui.dtaf2025.config.actually_open_shop.h: Determines whether Steve Co. Supply Crates can open the Minecraft shop
gui.dtaf2025.config.close.hover: Saves the config and closes the config screen
death.attack.space_suffocation: %1$s forgot that they couldn't breathe in space
death.attack.space_suffocation.player: %1$s forgot that they couldn't breathe in space while trying to escape %2$s
gui.dtaf2025.locked_chest.message.requir: You need a Steve Co. Supply Crate Key to open this.
gui.dtaf2025.locked_chest.message.store: You can pick one up at the Minecraft store.
gui.dtaf2025.locked_chest.store.hover: Opens Minecraft Shop in your browser
gui.dtaf2025.locked_chest.config_prevent: Your config settings prevented Minecraft Shop from opening
gui.dtaf2025.locked_chest.info.message: The Steve Co. Supply Crate is a reference to Minecraft Beta 1.4.
gui.dtaf2025.locked_chest.info.wiki: See more info on The Minecraft Wiki.
gui.dtaf2025.locked_chest.info.warning:
§c§lThis feature was made as a reference.
§r§cWe are not affiliated with Mojang Studios, Microsoft, or The Official Minecraft Shop.
We do not support nor encourage the use of crates, loot boxes, or gambling in exchange of real-world currency.
